track.name: Quiet Fire
comments: shivers.... love this one!  - thank you Paul :)
Soft and sweet. Melody certainly was named appropriately ! = ) ♥ ♥ ♥
No llores cuando la lluvia se acerca!
her voice is intoxicating! i could listento her all night!

I can't believe I'm just discovering her today?!? She has a quality in her voice that is missing in more than a few of the new generation of young jazz singers. They have the pipes, but haven't really lived enough life to convey emotion without being emotional.
This song is exactly its title. There's a burning passion that's so strong and perceptible, but it's so understated.
I love her voice so soft and sweet to hear..!!!
And the question is: WHO wouldn't make love to you, Melody?
